item.title: Why Demand a SAS 70 Type II Data Center?
item.description:
When choosing a cloud or colocation provider, prioritize data privacy and security, especially in regulated sectors like healthcare and finance. A facility with SAS 70 Type II compliance can offer this assurance. SAS 70, based on the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants (AICPA) Statement on Auditing Standards No. 70, Service Organizations, involves a rigorous audit of a company’s data handling practices by an independent firm. This audit results in a comprehensive written report...
